DOC.brief_summary: This study is conducted in North America. The purpose of this study is to evaluate the occurrence and severity of bleeding in brain injury and to identify important safety issues following traumatic brain injury.
DOC.brief_title: Incidence/Magnitude-Haemorrhagic Progression-Cerebral Contusions and Identification (ID) of Safety Issues After Traumatic Brain Injury
DOC.criteria: Ages Eligible for Study: 18 Years 85 Years
